mean_en: not in a place because of illness, etc.; not present in something; showing that you are not really looking at or thinking about what is happening around you
sentence: What a surprise! The best student is absent from school!
sentence_trans: 震惊！学霸今天没来学校！
word_etyma: ab远离的 + sent出现 → 没有出现 → absent缺席的
